languages.text: {n}Маражай смотрит мимо вас.{/n} "Назракей должен был стать секирой, что опустится на ее шею... но в итоге уничтожил меня. Изящно, достойно восхищения... но почему? Тайный союз с Иремерисс? Или есть иная причина? Когда-нибудь я вырву ответ из его глотки с последним вздохом".

{n}Marazhai looks past you.{/n} "Nazrakhei was supposed to be the axe that fell on her neck... but it fell on mine instead. It was devious and worthy of praise... but why? A secret pact with Yremeryss? Or is there another reason? I will tear the answer from his throat along with his final breath."
languages.original_text: {n}Маражай смотрит мимо вас.{/n} "Назракей должен был стать секирой, что опустится на ее шею... но в итоге уничтожил меня. Изящно, достойно восхищения... но почему? Тайный союз с Иремерисс? Или есть иная причина? Когда-нибудь я вырву ответ из его глотки с последним вздохом".

languages.text: {n}Marazhai mira al vacío.{/n} «Se suponía que Nazrakhei iba a ser el hacha que caería sobre su cabeza... pero en vez de eso cayó sobre la mía. Fue algo taimado y digno de alabanza... pero ¿por qué? ¿Tenía un pacto secreto con Yremeryss? ¿O hay otro motivo? Cuando le acabe con él, tendré que asegurarme de extraer la respuesta».
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai looks past you.{/n} "Nazrakhei was supposed to be the axe that fell on her neck... but it fell on mine instead. It was devious and worthy of praise... but why? A secret pact with Yremeryss? Or is there another reason? I will tear the answer from his throat along with his final breath."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai mira al vacío.{/n} «Se suponía que Nazrakhei iba a ser el hacha que caería sobre su cabeza... pero en vez de eso cayó sobre la mía. Fue algo taimado y digno de alabanza... pero ¿por qué? ¿Tenía un pacto secreto con Yremeryss? ¿O hay otro motivo? Cuando le acabe con él, tendré que asegurarme de extraer la respuesta».
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}玛拉斋的目光越过了你。{/n}“纳札骸这把利斧，本该砍在她的脖子上……结果却砍到了我的脖子上。这很狡猾，也很值得称赞……但他为什么要这么做？是他和伊芮梅莉斯有什么秘密约定？还是另有原因？我要把答案从他的喉咙里扯出来，亲手让他咽气。”
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai looks past you.{/n} "Nazrakhei was supposed to be the axe that fell on her neck... but it fell on mine instead. It was devious and worthy of praise... but why? A secret pact with Yremeryss? Or is there another reason? I will tear the answer from his throat along with his final breath."

traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}マラズハイは、あなたを無視する。{/n}「ナズラクヘイはあいつの首を落とすはずだったが…実際に飛んだのはあいつの首じゃなく俺の首だった。それは邪悪で賞賛に値するものだったよ…だが、なぜだ？イレメリスと密約を交わしたのか？それとも他に理由があったのか？奴が息を引き取る前に、答えをその喉からえぐり出してやる」
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai looks past you.{/n} "Nazrakhei was supposed to be the axe that fell on her neck... but it fell on mine instead. It was devious and worthy of praise... but why? A secret pact with Yremeryss? Or is there another reason? I will tear the answer from his throat along with his final breath."

traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Le regard de Marazhai se perd dans le vide.{/n} « Nazrakhei devait tenir le rôle de la hache prête à s'abattre sur son cou... mais c'est sur le mien qu'elle est tombée. C'était une ruse fort bien ficelée, j'en conviens... mais ses motifs m'échappent. Avait-il conclu un pacte secret avec Yremeryss ou y avait-il une autre raison ? Je lui arracherai la réponse en même temps que son dernier soupir. »
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai looks past you.{/n} "Nazrakhei was supposed to be the axe that fell on her neck... but it fell on mine instead. It was devious and worthy of praise... but why? A secret pact with Yremeryss? Or is there another reason? I will tear the answer from his throat along with his final breath."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le regard de Marazhai se perd dans le vide.{/n} « Nazrakhei devait tenir le rôle de la hache prête à s'abattre sur son cou... mais c'est sur le mien qu'elle est tombée. C'était une ruse fort bien ficelée, j'en conviens... mais ses motifs m'échappent. Avait-il conclu un pacte secret avec Yremeryss ou y avait-il une autre raison ? Je lui arracherai la réponse en même temps que son dernier soupir. »
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai blickt an dir vorbei.{/n} "Nazrakhei sollte die Axt sein, die auf ihren Hals fällt ... doch sie ist stattdessen auf meinen gefallen. Es war heimtückisch und lobenswert ... doch warum? Ein geheimer Pakt mit Yremeryss? Oder gibt es einen anderen Grund? Ich werde ihm die Antwort zusammen mit seinem letzten Atemzug aus der Kehle reißen."
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai looks past you.{/n} "Nazrakhei was supposed to be the axe that fell on her neck... but it fell on mine instead. It was devious and worthy of praise... but why? A secret pact with Yremeryss? Or is there another reason? I will tear the answer from his throat along with his final breath."

Ich werde ihm die Antwort zusammen mit seinem letzten Atemzug aus der Kehle reißen."

languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai looks past you.{/n} "Nazrakhei was supposed to be the axe that fell on her neck... but it fell on mine instead. It was devious and worthy of praise... but why? A secret pact with Yremeryss? Or is there another reason? I will tear the answer from his throat along with his final breath."

languages.text: {n}Marazhai seni görmezden geliyor.{/n} "Nazrakhei, onun celladı olacaktı anlayacağın... Ancak benim celladım oldu. Hakkını yemeyeyim, öyle böyle bir düzenbaz değilmiş... De neden? Gizlice Yremeryss'le de mi anlaştı? Yoksa başka sebebi mi vardı? İşte bu sorunun cevabını da son nefesiyle beraber boğazından söküp alacağım."
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai looks past you.{/n} "Nazrakhei was supposed to be the axe that fell on her neck... but it fell on mine instead. It was devious and worthy of praise... but why? A secret pact with Yremeryss? Or is there another reason? I will tear the answer from his throat along with his final breath."

De neden? Gizlice Yremeryss'le de mi anlaştı? Yoksa başka sebebi mi vardı? İşte bu sorunun cevabını da son nefesiyle beraber boğazından söküp alacağım."
